block.p: LUCENT TECHNOLOGIES INC., Murray Hill, N.J., the No. 1 phone equipment maker, said Metromedia Fiber Network Inc., White Plains, an operator of a fiber optic communications system, had agreed to buy $330 million of fiber optic cable.
TBC CORP., Memphis, a marketer and distributor of tires, agreed to acquire Tire Kingdom Inc., Riviera Beach, Fla., a privately held tire retailer, for $45 million in cash.

TBC CORP., Memphis, a marketer and distributor of tires, agreed to acquire Tire Kingdom Inc., Riviera Beach, Fla., a privately held tire retailer, for $45 million in cash.

II-VI INC., Saxonburg, Pa., a maker of optical and laser components, offered to acquire Laser Power Corp., San Diego, , which designs laser optics for industrial, medical and military uses, for $40.9 million in cash and stock, topping a bid by Union Miniere S.A., Brussels.
HONEYWELL INTERNATIONAL INC., Morris Township, N.J., a maker of automated controls, won an order from Unicom Corp., Chicago, for as many as 55 turbogenerators to provide backup electrical power.
